short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 9, 2024 at 2:00pm EST.
description: Architectural engineering services for RCMP detachments in La Ronge, SK and Southend, Saskatchewan.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title {TD4613726841}
M7594-243148 - RCMP Detachments La Ronge, SK and Southend, SK

#### Reference Information
[TDC461316207]
*-reference number*
*4* *amendment number*
*WS4608388437* *solicitation number*
*2024-06-04* *publication date*
*2024-07-09T14:00:00* *tender closing date*

#### Summary
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) and the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invite qualified service providers to submit proposals for the provision of architectural services for RCMP detachments in La Ronge, Saskatchewan and Southend, Saskatchewan.

#### Mandatory Requirements
* Submissions must be received by July 9, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
* Late bids will not be considered.
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) are applicable trade agreements.
* Saskatchewan is the geographical area of delivery for this project.

#### Award Criteria
Proposal submissions will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price, with weight given equally to both aspects. The selection will be determined by the agency.

#### Contact Information
* Agency Name: PSPC
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* Contact: Wiebe, Dallas (SPAC/PSPC), dallas.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Attachments: Not available.

Note: I have kept only necessary details in the rewritten text. Including all the details would have led to exceeding the 400-word limit. The rewritten entry maintains the same format as the original with some modifications for readability. It includes relevant information such as title, reference number, solicitation, tender closing date, mandatory requirements, selection criteria, and contact information.
